sentences.english: The life-model for the painting of the figure of Jesus was hosen first.
sentences.chinese: 基督画像的真人模特是第一位被遴选。

sentences.english: A supplier selection problem belongs to a multiple criteria decision making (MCDM) problem.
sentences.chinese: 供应商遴选问题属于多准则决策分析问题。

sentences.english: They selected a diamond engagement ring.
sentences.chinese: 他们遴选了一枚钻石订亲戒指。

sentences.english: The selection committee's decision is FINAL and unchallengeable.
sentences.chinese: 遴选委员会的决定是最终决定，不容挑战。

sentences.english: One of the most troubling of these problems is the impact of race on jury selection.
sentences.chinese: 这些问题中最令人不安的是种族对遴选陪审员的影响。

sentences.english: The decisions of the United College Working Committee on Selection of Resident Students are final.
sentences.chinese: 合书院遴选宿生工作小组保派发宿位之最后决定权。

sentences.english: I could choose from several universities as I came out of high school.
sentences.chinese: 高中结业时，我可以从浩繁大学中遴选一所。

sentences.english: Award nominees were chosen by people from all areas of the entertainment industry.
sentences.chinese: 入围者是由娱乐界各领域中的人所遴选出来。

sentences.english: The examples of music score used in this thesis were chosen on this basis.
sentences.chinese: 本文所运用的谱例就是在此基础上遴选出的。

sentences.english: The coaches held a meeting and selected the cream of the crop for the all-star team.
sentences.chinese: 教练们举行一场会议，遴选优秀选手编入明星队。

sentences.english: Story of Palaeobotany Series (Supplemental issue): How is the palaeobotany Fellow or Foreign Member of the Royal Society in London selected?
sentences.chinese: 英国皇家学会古植物学院士与外籍院士是如何遴选的？

sentences.english: He advised farmers to choose the best-heads.
sentences.chinese: 他劝告农民要遴选最好的谷穗。

sentences.english: Here's a selection of non-fiction possibilities, with brief descriptions and links to excerpts .
sentences.chinese: 这里的遴选非虚构的可能性，并简要说明联系摘编。

sentences.english: One who obtains the principal certificate is qualified to apply for the principal position in any county.
sentences.chinese: 获得校长证照，可以直接参加各县市的校长遴选。

sentences.english: This book arrangement still chose the prose household utensils year is a foreword.
sentences.chinese: 本书编排仍以遴选的散文家生年为序。

sentences.english: It's a small select group of people.
sentences.chinese: 那是精心遴选出来的一小群人。

definition: to select/to detail/to set apart/to appoint
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
to examine/to check up on/to assess/to review/appraisal/review/evaluation
